attributes.action: ensure that children at secondary schools get the education they deserve so they are well equipped to thrive when they leave school, and are taught to respect those in authority and are disciplined if they do not behave appropriately in school, being expelled if necessary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: |My son is 16, and leaving school in a couple of months time. He had an excellent primary school education and his behaviour, attitude and basic numeracy and literacy skills were far superior to his current level. Secondary school education does not prepare children for life after school and we seem to be producing young adults who are poorly equipped to deal with real life.
